mapper.insert: INSERT INTO house_review (apt_seq, user_seq, review_title, review_rate, review_content) VALUES (#{aptSeq}, #{userSeq}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewRate}, #{reviewContent})
mapper.update: UPDATE house_review SET review_title = #{reviewTitle}, review_rate = #{reviewRate}, review_content = #{reviewContent} WHERE apt_seq = #{aptSeq} AND user_seq = #{userSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM house_review WHERE apt_seq = #{aptSeq} AND user_seq = #{userSeq}
